author: Erin Doherty
title: Poroshenko: "To protect the nation ... brings the risk for your own life"
description: It's a unifying move that echos that of current President Zelensky, who remains resolute in his determination to stay put.
content:
Former Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko said Saturday, "Im ready, unfortunately yes," when asked if he was prepared to die in Kyiv as Russian military forces resume their offensive.
